sentences.pinyin: Tā de jì néng fēicháng chūsè.
sentences.translation: His technical ability is very outstanding.

sentences.simplifiedText: 为了提升他的技能，他决定参加一个专业的培训课程。
sentences.traditionalText: 為了提升他的技能，他決定參加一個專業的培訓課程。
sentences.pinyin: Wèile tíshēng tā de jì néng, tā juédìng cānjiā yīgè zhuānyè de péixùn kèchéng.
sentences.translation: In order to improve his technical ability, he decided to take a professional training course.
